fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.bll.implementations

Class BidManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.bll.implementations.GenericManagerImpl
      • fr.eikasus.objectsmyfriends.model.bll.implementations.BidManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BidManager

    @ApplicationScoped
 @BidManagerDB
public class BidManagerImpl
extends GenericManagerImpl
implements BidManager
    Bid manager class.

    This class is used to manage bids according to the business logic. It should be used by the controllers to handle bids like adding, deleting and so. The access of one of data access object method by the controllers is strictly forbidden. There is no method to retrieve bids from the database because they are contained in the item itself. Retrieving an item allow then access to its bids.

    See Also:
    add(User, Item, int), delete(User)

      • add

        public Bid add(@NotNull
               @NotNull User user,
               @NotNull
               @NotNull Item item,
               int price)
        throws ModelException
        Make a bid on an item.

        This method is used to create a bid made by a user on an item with the supplied price. There are some reasons why this operation can't be done. See the validate() method for more details.

        Specified by:
        add in interface BidManager
        Parameters:
        user - User that make the bid.
        item - Item on which the bid is made.
        price - Price of the bid
        Returns:
        New bid successfully created.
        Throws:
        ModelException - In case of problem.

      • delete

        public void delete(@NotNull
                   @NotNull User user)
            throws ModelException
        Delete bids.

        This method delete all the bids that belongs to the supplied user.

        Specified by:
        delete in interface BidManager
        Parameters:

        Throws:
